response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. This product holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, but I understand the importance of finding the right balance for all parties involved. Therefore, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for you at $1,100,000. This is a special opportunity that I hope will be beneficial for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the transaction. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
